content: thank you for your interest in my african spirit flamingos i designed this flamingo pattern while creating african spirit but decided not to use it but with you all loving the extra sections i decided to get it on the computer for you all african spirit flamingos has the same stitch count as my african spirit pattern and all the same us overlay mosaic crochet terms 1 repeat chain 60 2 repeats chain 116 3 repeats chain 172 4 repeats chain 228 with thanks to my amazing group members karen edmonds connie kapp annmarie coinmaster jones barbara gluck and dinah hamill for your amazing photos and for testing this design any questions you can email me here athey sarah@outlook com my facebook group with lots of free stuff is here https //www facebook com/groups/809381026680096/ ref=share_group_link
